author: Flannery O'Connor
review_title: Flannery and Her Gothic Flapjacks: A Case Study
teaser: From the days of John the Baptist until now, the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent bear it away.
title: The Violent Bear It Away

author: Ursula K. Le Guin
review_title: Kemmering and Shitting Your Pants: A Lefthanded Guide
teaser: Light is the left hand of darkness, and darkness the right hand of light. Two are one, life and death.
title: The Left Hand of Darkness

author: Ta-Nehisi Coates
review_title: Just Because You're Between Two Buns Doesn't Mean You're a Sandwich
teaser: You must always remember that the sociology, the history, the economics, the graphs, the charts, the regressions all land, with great violence, upon the body.
title: Between the World and Me

author: Graham Greene
review_title: Graham Greene's Fascinating Peak Through a Guatemalan Gloryhole
teaser: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory, forever and ever, amen.
title: The Power and the Glory
